title.rendered: Ariful’s century, Bangladesh threw a big target to the United States

content.rendered:
Bangladesh U-19 team suffered a big blow in losing against India. However, after overcoming that setback, Tiger Youth defeated Ireland by a big margin.This time, if they beat their last match opponent USA in the group stage, the Super Six stage will be confirmed.  

Bangladesh lost the toss and batted first in the ‘A’ group match in Bloemfontein today. After losing 7 wickets in 50 overs, they set a big target of 292 runs. Young all-rounder Ariful Islam scored a great century with the bat. Ahrar Amin also played an important innings.

However, Bangladesh’s batting start was not comfortable. They lost the wicket of opener Adil Bin Siddique (13) for the team’s 29 runs. After that, another opener Ashiqur Rahman Shibli wants to continue the fight Chowdhury Md. About Rizwan. However, Shibli (27) left before their pair grew up.

After Shibli’s departure, Rizwan and Ariful formed a good pair. That pair is also ahead of the party 100 in the division. Rizwan’s innings of 35 runs off 40 balls. But after that, Ariful and Ahran did not allow danger. The duo’s 122-run stand laid the foundation for Bangladesh’s big collection. Ahrar returns with 44 runs off 49 balls. And Arif played a great innings of 103 runs off 9 fours off 103 balls. Besides, captain Mahfuzur Rahman Rabi played a 17-ball 31-run innings in the lower middle order.

USA bowler Arya Garg took 3 wickets and Arin Nadkardi took 2 wickets with the ball.
